mapper.select: SELECT t1.brd_typ as brdTyp ,t1.title ,t1.list_read_auth as listReadAuth ,(SELECT ct1.code_nm FROM BOM_CODE_TB ct1 WHERE ct1.code_knd1 = 'MG' AND ct1.code_knd2 = 'MG16' AND ct1.code = t1.list_read_auth) AS listReadAuthNm ,t1.read_auth as readAuth ,(SELECT ct1.code_nm FROM BOM_CODE_TB ct1 WHERE ct1.code_knd1 = 'MG' AND ct1.code_knd2 = 'MG16' AND ct1.code = t1.read_auth) AS readAuthNm ,t1.write_auth as writeAuth ,(SELECT ct1.code_nm FROM BOM_CODE_TB ct1 WHERE ct1.code_knd1 = 'MG' AND ct1.code_knd2 = 'MG16' AND ct1.code = t1.write_auth) AS writeAuthNm ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOM_BOARD_TB ct1 WHERE ct1.brd_typ = t1.brd_typ AND ct1.del_yn = 'F') AS totalCnt ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOM_BOARD_TB ct1 WHERE ct1.brd_typ = t1.brd_typ AND ct1.ins_dt BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(DATE_FORMAT(NOW() ,'%y%m%d' ) ,'%y%m%d' ) AND NOW() AND ct1.del_yn = 'F') AS todayCnt FROM BOM_BOARD_MNG_TB t1 WHERE t1.del_yn = 'F' ORDER BY t1.brd_typ

SELECT t1.brd_typ AS brdTyp ,t1.title ,t1.atta_yn AS attaYn ,t1.reply_yn AS replyYn ,t1.comm_yn AS commYn ,t1.secr_yn AS secrYn ,t1.new_view_yn AS newViewYn ,t1.comm_view_yn AS commViewYn ,t1.atta_view_yn AS attaViewYn ,t1.list_read_auth AS listReadAuth ,t1.write_auth AS writeAuth ,t1.read_auth AS readAuth ,t1.reply_write_auth AS replyWriteAuth ,t1.reply_read_auth AS replyReadAuth ,t1.comm_write_auth AS commWriteAuth ,t1.comm_read_auth AS commReadAuth ,t1.img_use_yn as imgUseYn ,t1.public_use_yn as publicUseYn FROM BOM_BOARD_MNG_TB t1 WHERE t1.brd_typ = #brdTyp#
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOM_BOARD_MNG_TB(brd_typ ,title ,atta_yn ,reply_yn ,comm_yn ,secr_yn ,new_view_yn ,comm_view_yn ,atta_view_yn ,list_read_auth ,write_auth ,read_auth ,reply_write_auth ,reply_read_auth ,comm_write_auth ,comm_read_auth ,ins_dt ,ins_user ,upd_dt ,upd_user ) VALUES (max(brd_typ)+1, #title#, #attaYn#, #replyYn#, #commYn# ,#secrYn#, #newViewYn#, #commViewYn#, #attaViewYn# ,#listReadAuth#, #writeAuth#, #readAuth#, #replyWriteAuth# ,#replyReadAuth#, #commWriteAuth#, #commReadAuth#, NOW() ,#insUser#, NOW(), #updUser# )
mapper.update: UPDATE BOM_BOARD_MNG_TB SET title = #title# ,atta_yn = #attaYn# ,reply_yn = #replyYn# ,comm_yn = #commYn# ,secr_yn = #secrYn# ,new_view_yn = #newViewYn# ,comm_view_yn = #commViewYn# ,atta_view_yn = #attaViewYn# ,list_read_auth = #listReadAuth# ,write_auth = #writeAuth# ,read_auth = #readAuth# ,reply_write_auth = #replyWriteAuth# ,reply_read_auth = #replyReadAuth# ,comm_write_auth = #commWriteAuth# ,comm_read_auth = #commReadAuth# ,upd_dt = NOW() ,upd_user = #updUser# WHERE brd_typ = #brdTyp#
